items.preText: Rezaul: "Whoa! 82 balls since last boundary! This is some top class bowling from Bangladesh." -- It's now 100 balls.
items.text: back of a length on off stump, punched to extra-cover
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Holder, no run

items.text: fullish on the pads, clipped to the right of long-on
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Holder, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length on off stump, punched back to the bowler
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Holder, no run

items.text: a boundary, whodathunk! Back of a length on off stump, sits up nicely, and Holder clears his front leg and flat-bats it up and over mid-off
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Holder, FOUR runs

items.text: four more. Back of a length on off stump again, and this time he plays a front-foot whip-pull over midwicket
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Holder, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length close to off stump, opens his bat face and steers to the right of third man
items.shortText: Soumya Sarkar to Holder, 1 run

items.preText:
Here's Mehidy, by the way.

TQ: "Confused as to why they are making Sarkar bowl here and not bringing back Mehidy? Might as well finish the quota for the spinners" -- Testing out sixth-bowler strategies ahead of the World Cup?
items.text: nice length on off stump, draws Holder forward but not close enough to the pitch to drive. Defended into the covers
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Holder, no run

items.text: flatter on off stump, punched off the back foot back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Holder, no run

items.text: a bit more flight, uses his reach to clip this from off stump to the left of deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Holder, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, gets back and across to work it through square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: tossed up just outside off, gets on the front foot to drive to the right of long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Holder, 2 runs

items.text: length ball on off stump, clipped with the turn to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Holder, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off stump, straightens a little. Stays on the back foot to defend to mid-off
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Holder, no run

items.text: full, on the pads, and that's not quite timed, but it'll do. Uses his reach to flick this over the top, and into the gap to the right of long-on. One bounce and over the rope
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Holder, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length on off stump, clipped down to long-on
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Holder, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, whipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Hope, no run

items.text: back of a length, fourth-stump line, punched down to long-on
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Hope, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, straightens a bit off the pitch. Looks to play it down to long-on with a slightly closed face, and the ball pops off the leading edge to the right of extra-cover
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Holder, 1 run

items.text: big appeal for lbw as Holder misses the front-foot flick, but I'm guessing this was spinning too much. Lovely length, catches Holder half-forward
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Holder, no run

items.text: flat length ball outside off, Holder looks to use his reach and work it leg side. Plays too early, with hard hands, and sends a leading edge ballooning over the point region
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Holder, 1 run

items.text: a bit closer to off stump, clipped to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: another big appeal, this time for caught behind, as Holder plays an awkward-looking sweep from outside off - just strode forward without getting down low, and the ball sneaked under his bat
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Holder, no run

items.text: nice flight outside off, Holder flicks in the air, but to the left of the diving midwicket fielder
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Holder, 1 run

items.text: flatter length ball on off stump, worked away through square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length ball on middle stump, nice bit of fielding at midwicket, a dive to the right to stop Hope's well-timed flick
items.shortText: Abu Jayed to Hope, no run
